title: Biometric system introduced at Torkham border (Ministry of Interior and Narcotics Control of the Islamic ...
text: ( Source : Ministry of Interior and Narcotics Control of the Islamic Republic of Pakistan ) JAMRUD: The government has introduced biometric system on the Pak-Afghan border at Torkham to check illegal cross-border movement. The biometric system
